message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I think it would be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Can you consider that?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. However, I can't go lower than $9,000 for this product. It's a very fair price considering the value it offers.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,750?
